apps.description: The Accelerometer app is a nervousnet extension app used to show the usage of Accelerometer values using the nervousnet HUB API's.
The Lightmeter app is a nervousnet extension app used to show the usage of Light Sensor values using the nervousnet HUB API's.
The Noisemeter app is a nervousnet extension app used to show the usage of Noise Sensor values using the nervousnet HUB API's.
